version_description: Bug fixed where audio would sometimes drop out

Weâ€™ve been working hard to update the Say It app!

New content and features:

-40,000 American English recordings
-Explore content from the English File course
-Share your pronunciation with teachers and friends

The app is now fully iOS 11 compatible and a known keyboard issue has been fixed. The design of the app has also been refreshed - we hope you enjoy using it!

This release fixes an issue which was blocking some in-app purchases as well as other features - thank you for your feedback!

New content and features:

-40,000 American English recordings
-Explore content from the English File course
-Share your pronunciation with teachers and friends

The app is now fully iOS 11 compatible and a known keyboard issue has been fixed. The design of the app has also been refreshed - we hope you enjoy using it!
- UI improvements, fix to keyboard in Look Up

We hope you are enjoying using the new version of Say It. This release includes:
- Minor bug fixes
- App previews

The Say It team have been hard at work.  The app is now fully compatible with iPhone X and iOS 12.  We have also made some minor improvements and tweaks to improve the overall experience.  We hope you enjoy using the app!

This version of Say It has the following improvement:

- Greater efficiency for in-app purchase downloads.

We hope you continue to enjoy improving your pronunciation with Say It: English Pronunciation!

- Fix to issue faced when switching between applications
- Minor bugs and fixes

- Better app stability.
